Uses of Package
com.netflix.msl.entityauth

Packages that use com.netflix.msl.entityauth
com.netflix.msl Constants and exceptions. 
com.netflix.msl.entityauth Entity authentication. 
com.netflix.msl.msg Messaging classes, including the MSL stack interface MslControl. 
com.netflix.msl.util Auxiliary classes including the application configuration MslContext and data store MslStore. 
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.entityauth used by com.netflix.msl
EntityAuthenticationData
          The entity authentication data provides proof of entity identity.
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.entityauth used by com.netflix.msl.entityauth
EntityAuthenticationData
          The entity authentication data provides proof of entity identity.
EntityAuthenticationFactory
          A entity authentication factory creates authentication data instances and authenticators for a specific entity authentication scheme.
EntityAuthenticationScheme
          Entity authentication schemes.
PresharedKeyStore
          A preshared key store contains trusted preshared keys.
PresharedKeyStore.KeySet
          A set of encryption, HMAC, and wrapping keys.
RsaStore
          An RSA public key store contains trusted RSA public keys.
X509Store
          An X.509 certificate store.
